channel.title: HELP with basicly alot
channel.description:
how do i make spawn time, monsters, admin and moderstrator positions, a downloadable client, and how do i get my server online at the status list?
-------Thanks, oh god, school is tommarow, and the day after that, and the day after that!! :(

item.title: HELP with basicly alot

Thanks!

i’ve only have like 2people act nice to me here so far, you and another kid

:eek: i think i can figure it out from here, thanks

(don’t bump this thread anymore unless it’s a reply, answer found)

item.title: HELP with basicly alot
item.dc:creator: @Metamorphoze Metamorphoze
item.description:
@Metamorphoze wrote:

“1. I saw a tut in the tutorials section a couple days ago check there.
2. Add monsters in autospawn.cfg.
3. You make people mod and admin by going into the folder called characters, then find the person, and then change the player rights from 0 to (1 for mod) (2 for admin) (3 for owner)
4. You get a client from the downloads section.
5. Go to moparisthebest.com/serverstatus press register then put your server ip and name and description.”

um… how do i get the client? autospawn.cfg.? is that in the mopar folder or is that a site because i tried to do that as a site… and THANKS!

you really helped me get an inch closer

Read full topic

item.title: HELP with basicly alot
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

  1. I saw a tut in the tutorials section a couple days ago check there.
  2. Add monsters in autospawn.cfg.
  3. You make people mod and admin by going into the folder called characters, then find the person, and then change the player rights from 0 to (1 for mod) (2 for admin) (3 for owner)
  4. You get a client from the downloads section.
  5. Go to moparisthebest.com/serverstatus press register then put your server ip and name and description.

Read full topic
